summary: After the events of the anime, Rintarou begins to feel the repercussions of extensive time travel, and eventually completely fades from reality. Kurisu, being the only companion to remember him, now must find a way to bring him back.
cast: Mamoru Miyano|Asami Imai|Kana Hanazawa|Tomokazu Seki|Saori Gotô|Yû Kobayashi|Haruko Momoi|Yukari Tamura|Masaki Terasoma|Ayano Yamamoto|Noriaki Morita|Hiroko Ushida|Rieko Kamenaka|Ashly Burch|Jessica Cavanagh|Colleen Clinkenbeard|Justin Cook|Cris George|Trina Nishimura|Brina Palencia|Tyson Rinehart|Christopher Sabat|Jad Saxton|Lindsay Seidel|J. Michael Tatum
director: Directors: Kanji Wakabayashi, Hiroshi Hamazaki | 1 more credit »
title: Steins;Gate: El déjà vu de la región de carga
